iPad Retina

screen.width        768
screen.height       1024
devicePixelRatio    2


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=768,
        view=full

innerWidth          768
innerHeight         960


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=768,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          768
innerHeight         985


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=3072,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          3072
innerHeight         3938


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=1024,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          1024
innerHeight         729


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=4096,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          4096
innerHeight         2914
